text: Kjell Lönnå (13 July 1936 – 10 May 2022) was a Swedish choir leader, composer and television personality. He was born in Smedjebacken, Sweden. His career lasted from 1953 until 2022. He wrote the soundtrack for Den Svenska Psalmboken. Lönnå was one of the national conductors for the National Swedish Choir Association. Lönnå died on 10 May 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish composers Category:Swedish musicians Category:Swedish television personalities
title: Kjell Lönnå
